TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClipboardData extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示使用剪贴板传递的数据。

span.span: Represents the data passed around with the clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含三种类型的数据：The contains three types of data: - 数据本身（通过 属性访问）。The data itself, accessed through the property. - 元数据（通过 属性访问）。The metadata, accessed through the property. - 版本信息（通过 属性访问）。The version information, accessed through the property.
